articles.title: PS5 cloud streaming details: launch dates and bandwidth requirements - The Verge
articles.description: The service launched October 17th in Japan, with the EU and North America coming later in October. Sony recommends at least 52Mbps bandwidth for 4K streaming.
articles.content:

articles.title: Bank of America profit rises 10% - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: The second-largest US bank got a boost from higher interest income and a strong performance from its Wall Street unit.
articles.content:
